heisig_chinese_memo: Pictograph of a spell book vol. I think of that Harry Potter spell book that had to be bound shut coz it wanted to eat you.
heisig_story: This key word is a counter for books. It differs from scrapbook both in the writing order and in the extension of the second horizontal stroke.
koohiiStory1: Pictograph. I think of that Harry Potter spell book that had to be bound shut coz it wanted to eat you.
koohiiStory2: 冊 さつ 1: counter for books A heavy scrapbook so full that flowers are sticking out. Only if a scrapbook is that full, it can be called a heavy book.
jp_readingExamples: 冊子 (さっし), 別冊 (べっさつ)
WaniKani_Kanji_Meaning: Book Counter, Counter For Books, Counter For Volumes
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You use a bookshelf as a book counter. Duh. What are you gonna count them one by one? Okay, well maybe, but you should count them while they're nice and organized and on shelves. Otherwise counting is going to be a huge pain.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine counting books on a bunch of bookshelves. One book, two book, red book, blue book!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: While you were counting books using this book counter method, you got a bit tired and sat (さつ) down. But lucky for you, your books counter is a bookshelf, so just because you sat down doesn't mean you have to stop counting books.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You sat down, but the books can't stop you from counting them.
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ｜, 亅 (зазубрина), 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 廾 (двадцать), 冊 (том)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: twenty (廾) wide (冂) volumes
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This looks like a couple of vol. (volumes) of the same series of books.
humanum_full_description_en:
The shape of a bamboo slip which is woven together by ropes. The original meaning is a brief book. On the upper part of the characters " Ce " in Shiyougui and Mi Diaogui, there are two vertical pens with dots on them. The dots on the vertical pens mostly extend into a short horizontal line, which is similar to the shape of " bamboo ". The top of the word " Book " is from the corrupted source of " Bamboo " (Shang Chengzuo, Zhang Shichao, etc.). The upper part of the word " book " from which the word " dian " comes from also has a similar change, see " dian ".

"Shu Wen": "Books (Books), Fu Ming also. Zhu Zhen Jin received by the king. Like a long and one short book, there are two parts in the shape. All the books belong to the book. 𥬰 (笧), ancient literature book From bamboo."

Oracle is mostly used as a noun to indicate a brief. "Chunshu" means "title", which means to lift up a short book. It also uses the animal method, pronounced " delete ", which means to chop (Yu Shengwu), "Complete Collection" 31137: "Ten Prison Book", which means to chop and kill ten captive cattle.

Bronze writing is also used as a noun to indicate a book. "Mate Book" refers to a book that records the orders of the emperor. Song Ding: "Song and worship the chief inspector, receive orders (order)." Thirteen years 𤼈 pot: "Wang Hu (hu) Zha (made) Yin Ceyi (given) 𤼈", which means that Wang Zhaohuan Zhachu Yin rewards 𤼈 according to the book. Shi Yougui: "Shu Ming Shi You", "Chu Ming" means that the king's life in the booklet is read out and Shi You is entrusted. In ancient times, when monarchs appointed queens, princes, princes, and ministers, they had the custom of putting the king's order on bamboo slips or later scrolls, which the recipients would accept in etiquette. It was called "canonization" or "canonization."

It is also used as an official name. Also used as the clan name.

The " book " of the brief book of the Warring States period or writing from " bamboo " from " pian " from " jin ", see " strategy ".

In the past, scholars based on the different lengths of bamboo slips in the oracle bone inscription " Chapter ", denying the shape of the bamboo slips compiled by the " Chapter " image. And think that " Chapter " is like a fence, the first article of " Zha " (Bai Chuanjing, Xia Lu). This is not credible, because Oracle has a character form from " book " to "廾" (" 𠬞 "), like a book with hands raised, so " book " cannot be like a fence, because the hands can be lifted, only It may be a short book.
humanum_short_description_en: The shape of a bamboo slip with two ropes, the original meaning is a book.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文象以繩索編在一起的竹簡之形，象有兩道編繩之形，本義是簡冊。師酉簋、弭弔簋「冊」字上部有兩豎筆上有圓點之形，豎筆上的圓點多延伸為一短橫，與「竹」字形近，是《說文》古文「冊」字頂部從「竹」的訛變來源(商承祚、張世超等)。「典」字所從的「冊」字上部也有相近的變化，參見「典」。

　　《說文》：「冊(册)，符命也。諸矦進受於王也。象其札一長一短、中有二編之形。凡冊之屬皆从冊。𥬰(笧)，古文冊从竹。」

　　甲骨文多用作名詞，表示簡冊。「爯冊」即「稱冊」，舉起簡冊之意。又是用牲法，讀作「刪」，表示砍(于省吾)，《合集》31137：「叀十牢冊」，表示砍殺十隻圈養的牛。

　　金文也用作名詞，表示冊書，「命冊」指記載天子命令之簡冊。頌鼎：「頌拜稽首，受令(命)冊」。十三年𤼈壺：「王乎(呼)乍(作)冊尹冊易(賜)𤼈」，表示王召喚作冊尹根據冊書賞賜𤼈。師酉簋：「冊命師酉」，「冊命」表示宣讀簡冊上的王命，冊封師酉。古代君主封立皇后、太子、諸侯、大臣時都有把王命書於竹簡或後來的卷軸上由受封者於禮儀中迎受的習慣，是之為「冊封」或「冊立」。

　　又用作官名，「作冊」負責掌管文書記事冊命等。又用作族氏名。

　　簡冊之「冊」戰國或寫作從「竹」從「片」從「斤」，參見「策」。

　　過去有學者根據甲骨文「冊」字的竹簡長短不一，否定「冊」象編好的竹簡之形。而認為「冊」象柵欄，是「柵」的初文(白川靜、夏淥)。此說不可信，因為甲骨文有一字形從「冊」從「廾」(「𠬞」)，象雙手舉起冊之形，則「冊」不可能象圍欄，因為雙手可以舉起的，只可能是簡冊。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文象以繩索編在一起的竹簡之形，象有兩道編繩之形，本義是簡冊。

①古代稱編串好的竹簡，現在指裝潢好的紙本子：紀念冊。花名冊。畫冊。
②量詞，指書籍：一冊書。
③古代帝王祭祀天地神仙的文書或封爵的詔書：冊文(文體名，爲冊命、冊書等誥命文字的一種。簡稱“冊”)。冊命。冊封。

冊(さつ): counter for books

甲金文象以繩索編在一起的竹簡之形，象有兩道編繩之形，本義是簡冊。師酉簋、弭弔簋「 冊 」字上部有兩豎筆上有圓點之形，豎筆上的圓點多延伸為一短橫，與「 竹 」字形近，是《說文》古文「 冊 」字頂部從「 竹 」的訛變來源(商承祚、張世超等)。「 典 」字所從的「 冊 」字上部也有相近的變化，參見「 典 」。 《說文》：「冊(册)，符命也。諸矦進受於王也。象其札一長一短、中有二編之形。凡冊之屬皆从冊。𥬰(笧)，古文冊从竹。」 甲骨文多用作名詞，表示簡冊。「爯冊」即「稱冊」，舉起簡冊之意。又是用牲法，讀作「 刪 」，表示砍(于省吾)，《合集》31137：「叀十牢冊」，表示砍殺十隻圈養的牛。 金文也用作名詞，表示冊書，「命冊」指記載天子命令之簡冊。頌鼎：「頌拜稽首，受令(命)冊」。十三年𤼈壺：「王乎(呼)乍(作)冊尹冊易(賜)𤼈」，表示王召喚作冊尹根據冊書賞賜𤼈。師酉簋：「冊命師酉」，「冊命」表示宣讀簡冊上的王命，冊封師酉。古代君主封立皇后、太子、諸侯、大臣時都有把王命書於竹簡或後來的卷軸上由受封者於禮儀中迎受的習慣，是之為「冊封」或「冊立」。 又用作官名，「作冊」負責掌管文書記事冊命等。又用作族氏名。 簡冊之「 冊 」戰國或寫作從「 竹 」從「 片 」從「 斤 」，參見「 策 」。 過去有學者根據甲骨文「 冊 」字的竹簡長短不一，否定「 冊 」象編好的竹簡之形。而認為「 冊 」象柵欄，是「 柵 」的初文(白川靜、夏淥)。此說不可信，因為甲骨文有一字形從「 冊 」從「 廾 」(「 𠬞 」)，象雙手舉起冊之形，則「 冊 」不可能象圍欄，因為雙手可以舉起的，只可能是簡冊。
The shape of a bamboo slip which is woven together by ropes. The original meaning is a brief book. On the upper part of the characters " Ce" in Shiyougui and Mi Diaogui, there are two vertical pens with dots on them. The dots on the vertical pens mostly extend into a short horizontal line, which is similar to the shape of " bamboo". The top of the word " Book" is from the corrupted source of " Bamboo" (Shang Chengzuo, Zhang Shichao, etc.). The upper part of the word " book" from which the word " dian" comes from also has a similar change, see " dian". "Shu Wen": "Books (Books), Fu Ming also. Zhu Zhen Jin received by the king. Like a long and one short book, there are two parts in the shape. All the books belong to the book. 𥬰 (笧), ancient literature book From bamboo." Oracle is mostly used as a noun to indicate a brief. "Chunshu" means "title", which means to lift up a short book. It also uses the animal method, pronounced " delete", which means to chop (Yu Shengwu), "Complete Collection" 31137: "Ten Prison Book", which means to chop and kill ten captive cattle. Bronze writing is also used as a noun to indicate a book. "Mate Book" refers to a book that records the orders of the emperor. Song Ding: "Song and worship the chief inspector, receive orders (order)." Thirteen years 𤼈 pot: "Wang Hu (hu) Zha (made) Yin Ceyi (given) 𤼈", which means that Wang Zhaohuan Zhachu Yin rewards 𤼈 according to the book. Shi Yougui: "Shu Ming Shi You", "Chu Ming" means that the king's life in the booklet is read out and Shi You is entrusted. In ancient times, when monarchs appointed queens, princes, princes, and ministers, they had the custom of putting the king's order on bamboo slips or later scrolls, which the recipients would accept in etiquette. It was called "canonization" or "canonization." It is also used as an official name. Also used as the clan name. The " book" of the brief book of the Warring States period or writing from " bamboo" from " pian" from " jin", see " strategy". In the past, scholars based on the different lengths of bamboo slips in the oracle bone inscription " Chapter", denying the shape of the bamboo slips compiled by the " Chapter" image. And think that " Chapter" is like a fence, the first article of " Zha" (Bai Chuanjing, Xia Lu). This is not credible, because Oracle has a character form from " book" to " 廾" (" 𠬞"), like a book with hands raised, so " book" cannot be like a fence, because the hands can be lifted, only It may be a short book.

冊

Значения

Книга, том; счётный суффикс для книг

Мнемоника

Книга из сшитых бамбуковых дощечек.

Варианты

册

Radicals: 冊  (bookshelf)
Meaning Mnemonic
You use a bookshelf as a book counter. Duh. What are you gonna count them one by one? Okay, well maybe, but you should count them while they're nice and organized and on shelves. Otherwise counting is going to be a huge pain.
Imagine counting books on a bunch of bookshelves. One book, two book, red book, blue book!
Reading Mnemonic
While you were counting books using this book counter method, you got a bit tired and sat (さつ) down. But lucky for you, your books counter is a bookshelf, so just because you sat down doesn't mean you have to stop counting books.
You sat down, but the books can't stop you from counting them.

一 (один), ｜, 亅 (зазубрина), 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 廾 (двадцать), 冊 (том)
